statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); if ! git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then printf 'not a git repo'; exit 0; fi; export GIT_OPTIONAL_LOCKS=0; branch=$(git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); indicators=''; git -C "$cwd" diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null || indicators="${indicators}●"; git -C "$cwd" diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || indicators="${indicators}✚"; [ -n "$(git -C "$cwd" ls-files --others --exclude-standard 2>/dev/null)" ] && indicators="${indicators}…"; remote_branch=$(git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --abbrev-ref --symbolic-full-name @{u} 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$remote_branch" ]; then unpushed=$(git -C "$cwd" rev-list @{u}..HEAD 2>/dev/null | wc -l); [ "$unpushed" -gt 0 ] && indicators="${indicators}↑"; unpulled=$(git -C "$cwd" rev-list HEAD..@{u} 2>/dev/null | wc -l); [ "$unpulled" -gt 0 ] && indicators="${indicators}↓"; fi; pr_url=$(cd "$cwd" && gh pr view --json url -q .url 2>/dev/null); output=''; if [ -n "$indicators" ]; then output="${branch} [${indicators}]"; else output="${branch}"; fi; if [ -n "$pr_url" ]; then output="${output} | PR: ${pr_url}"; fi; printf "%s" "$output"
